title: my google pixel sends text messages twice as if i am the recipients
content: When i send a text messages in a group chat or to an individual person... The messages is sent back to the group or thread as a recipients ... I went to my carrier and swapped the sim card. I update my APN setting. This problem also triggers another problem where i dont receive 72% of my messages also sending messages to the  recipient, they dont get my text.. Please help
